text: This cafe offers a great dining experience with delicious food and a welcoming atmosphere. The dishes are well prepared, and the flavors shine through, making it a spot worth revisiting. Beyond the food, the staff stands out for their friendliness and attentive service, adding to the overall enjoyable experience. Whether you are there for a meal or just a coffee break, the warm hospitality makes it a comfortable place to relax.

A little pricey, but good value for money, for a good selection of high quality Japanese style sandwiches. The thick, tender and juicy pork katsu was my personal favourite, even though I’d suggest sharing it cuz of the large serving size and it could feel a tad oily after a while.

Great service!

I ordered a wagyu custom burger for about $27. Tasty.

Couldn finish it, so request to change to takeaway. the server was friendly and accepted the request with grace.

generally recommended.

Located just outside exit 4 of Outram Park MRT, this Japanese cafe serves freshly grounded coffee with many different blends of coffee to choose from. They also serve Sandos (sandwiches), which can be customised to your liking, and also burgers and finger foods as well.

The atmosphere of this cafe is lovely, with very little human traffic in the morning, and friendly staff. Enjoying my cup of coffee while chilling to the well curated Japanese playlist just makes my mornings so much better.

Great and excellent cup of cappuccino with bold flavors, (it’s double shot) perfect choice of beans used.
Located at a cool quiet corner, ample seats for a weekday afternoon coffee break.
A surprisingly great place for coffee although this place is famous for their sando. (Japanese sandwiches)
